## Map

```{r}
c(1,2,3) %>% map(function(a) a^0.5)
```

```{r}
c(1,2,3) %>% map(sqrt)
```


```{r}
c(1,2,3) %>% map(~sqrt(.))
```

## multiple 

```{r}
list(list(5, 27, 50), list(1000, 1000, 1000)) %>% 
  pmap(function(a,b) a*b)
```

```{r}
multiply <- function(a, b) {
  a * b
}

list(list(5, 27, 50), list(1000, 1000, 1000)) %>%
  pmap( ~ multiply(..1, ..2))
```
